title: @riot MAC user game connection issues
body:
Not really an active user of discussion boards so not sure if this is in the right spot... But Riot i really hope you can help me with this issue. 

I have recently been having trouble getting past the loading screen into the actual game and majority of the time when i try to play a game i will be the first to come on the loading screen and everyone else is not connected then people gradually connect saying they have loaded to 100% then min slowly loads usually getting stuck on one percentage or another until it gets into the 90%'s and it slowly increases very ever so slowly until it gets to 100% then freezes there. sometimes it gets through and the game has already been going for 5 mins other times i have to close the loading screen and reconnect. going through the whole process again. due to these errors i have now got to wait 20 mins to queue. 

it makes me very sad cause up until a few weeks ago i was connecting fine. i have been playing league since the beta and have always been a guy that treats people with respect and never put people down if they are bad. or doing worse then me instead i try to help them out. so please riot help me out here!

replies.body: Same issue here, I'm getting this error but after exiting and relaunching client I am able to get back into the loading screen and load into the game. Then after that I get his with huge ping spikes when my connection is completely fine.

>Mac version is still in beta.

That could be either a connection or hardware issue. Try looking up [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) and [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) page.

If you need any clarity on what to do, just ask.
